feature.name: Aananin
feature.origin: Korean god of the Heavens.

feature.name: Abassi
feature.origin: Efik (Ghana) creator god.

feature.name: Adjua
feature.origin: Mythical heroine and ancestor of the Ulci tribe.

feature.name: Agunua
feature.origin: San Cristobal (Melanesia) god who made sea, land, people.

feature.name: Ambat
feature.origin: Creator of islands from the giant shellfishes in mythology of Malekula Island (New Hebrides/Vanuatu, Melanesia).

feature.name: Ameta
feature.origin: Ceram (Indonesia) ancestor whose blood made Hainuwele.

feature.name: Amma
feature.origin: Dogon (Mali) creator of the universe.

feature.name: Amotken
feature.origin: Salish (NW USA, SW Canada) creator deity, wise and kind old man.

feature.name: Anansi
feature.origin: Spider in Ashanti (Ghana) mythology, who created the sun, moon, stars, and mankind.

feature.name: Anguta
feature.origin: Eskimo/Inuit (N. Canada) supreme being who created everything, father of the sea goddess Sedna.

feature.name: Arunaka
feature.origin: Inca creator of all things.

feature.name: Atabei
feature.origin: Taino (Puerto Rico) mother goddess, the “First-In-Existence.”

feature.name: Atum
feature.origin: Old creator God of Heliopolis; became son of Ptah.

feature.name: Avaiki Chasmata
feature.origin: Underworld in mythology of Cook Islands (Polynesia), home for mother of Vatea, the ancestor of gods and humans.

feature.name: Awonawilona
feature.origin: Zuni (New Mexico, USA) primeval deity, supreme life giver.

feature.name: Bulagat
feature.origin: Mythological ancestor of the Buriat tribe.

feature.name: Bumba
feature.origin: Bushongo; dwelt in primordial waters; vomited up sun, moon, stars, animals, and men. Showed man how to make fire.

feature.name: Burkhan
feature.origin: Buriat (Siberia) god who created world.

feature.name: Chingaso
feature.origin: Jivaro (Peru) wife of the creator god Kumpara.

feature.name: Con
feature.origin: Inca coastal creator god.

feature.name: Dangun
feature.origin: Mythical ancestor of Korean nation, son of creator god.

feature.name: Djuli
feature.origin: Neghidahan (Ukrainian) first man who was ancestor of the people.

feature.name: Dohitt
feature.origin: Mosetene (N. Bolivia) creator of the earth and men.

feature.name: Dotet
feature.origin: Ket (Yenisey River area, Central Siberia, Russia) god, creator of the northern, down-sloped part of the earth.

feature.name: Ehecatl
feature.origin: Aztec feathered serpent god of wind, one of the creators of the Earth, heavens and humans. His other name is Quetzalcoatl.

feature.name: Ellyay
feature.origin: Yakutian ancestor of the people.

feature.name: Enkai
feature.origin: Maasai (Tanzania, Kenya) creator god and the ruler of rains.

feature.name: Faro
feature.origin: Mande; his sacrificial killing in heaven atoned for his twin Pemba's sin; purified Earth.

feature.name: Fatu
feature.origin: Samoan (Polynesia) male of the first human couple.

feature.name: Fuxi
feature.origin: Chinese god, husband of the goddess Nugua. These two beings were worshipped as the ultimate ancestors of all humankind.

feature.name: Galunlati Chasmata
feature.origin: Vault above the sky in Cherokee (SE USA) myths, where anything that was alive lived before the creation of Earth.

feature.name: Gborogboro
feature.origin: Lugbara (Uganda) first man, pair to Meme.

feature.name: Glooskap
feature.origin: Algonquin (Great Lakes area, Canada and USA) creator of plants, animals and humans; son of the Great Earth Mother.

feature.name: Gmerti
feature.origin: Georgian (Caucasus) god, founder and keeper of the world order.

feature.name: Gucumatz
feature.origin: Mayan creator god.

feature.name: Haik
feature.origin: Mythological ancestor of the Armenian people.

feature.name: Haoso
feature.origin: Manchurian creator of all things.

feature.name: Harahvaiti Fossa
feature.origin: Beautiful land created by Persian god Ahura Mazda (Ormazd); modern Kandahar, Afghanistan.

feature.name: Heller
feature.origin: Auracanin creator of men and bringer of civilization.

feature.name: Huracan
feature.origin: Kiche (Guatemala) creator god, bringer of children, ruler of wind and storms.

feature.name: Imberombera
feature.origin: Kakadu (N. Australia) creator goddess, the Great Mother, mate of the giant Wuraka.

feature.name: Imra
feature.origin: Kafir (Nuristan, NE Afghanistan) supreme god, creator of gods and people.

feature.name: Inktomi
feature.origin: Dakota (USA) spirit, "The Spider," created time, space and language.

feature.name: Inmar
feature.origin: Udmurtian (Uralic Finns, Russia) creator god.

feature.name: Iraca
feature.origin: Incan creator god who became the moon.

feature.name: Itciai
feature.origin: Yaruro (Venezuela) jaguar god, creator of the river waters.

feature.name: Izanagi
feature.origin: Japanese creator god, brother of Izanami.

feature.name: Izanami
feature.origin: Sister and wife of Izanagi; creator goddess.

feature.name: Jumo
feature.origin: Marijan sky god.

feature.name: Juok
feature.origin: Shilluk (S. Sudan) creator god.

feature.name: Kanobo
feature.origin: Warrau/Warao (Orinoco River Delta, Venezuela) benevolent supreme being and creator god.

feature.name: Karora
feature.origin: Aranda (Australia) ancestor who, in his dreams, gives birth to animals and male children.

feature.name: Karusakaibo
feature.origin: Mundurucu (Tapajos and Trombetas Rivers area, NE Brazil) creator god.

feature.name: Khado
feature.origin: Nanajan; mythological hero who built the world. The first Shaman.

feature.name: Khutsau
feature.origin: Ossetian (N. Caucasus, Russia) supreme god, creator of the Earth.

feature.name: Kiho
feature.origin: Tuamotu (Society Islands) progenitor being; existed in void; made land, sea.

feature.name: Kirinyaga Linea
feature.origin: Kikuyu (Kenya) holy mountain, where the creator god Ngai lives, when he came down from the sky (Mount Kenya).

feature.name: Koykamou Catena
feature.origin: Nganasan (Taymyr Peninsula Samoyed, Russia) mythical mountain range, the first land to appear from the primordial waters after creation. The first man and woman were placed on it.

feature.name: Kuksu
feature.origin: Pomo (N. California, USA) deity who created the world with his brother Madumda.

feature.name: Kuma
feature.origin: Yaruro (Venezuela) moon goddess, creator of all things.

feature.name: Kumpara
feature.origin: Jivaro (Ecuador) creator god.

feature.name: [Kun Lun Chasma]
feature.origin: Mountain dwelling place of the immortals.

feature.name: Kunlun Linea
feature.origin: Mountain in Chinese mythology, dwelling place of the immortals, location of palace of Hsi Wang Mu (Xiwangmu), the Queen Mother of the West.

feature.name: Kurkyl
feature.origin: Chukchi (NE Russia) creator raven.

feature.name: Leza
feature.origin: Tonga originator of the conditions of life.

feature.name: Ligoupup
feature.origin: Micronesian (Truk/Chuuk Island, Caroline Islands) earth goddess, created the world together with her husband Anulap, a god of magic and knowledge.

feature.name: Lowa
feature.origin: Marshall Islands (Micronesia) great creator god.

feature.name: Lowalangi
feature.origin: Nias Island (W. Indonesia) sky god, creator of humans.

feature.name: Luli
feature.origin: Ember-goose who took up some clay from an ocean floor to create a land in Mansi myth (W. Siberia, Russia).

feature.name: Lumawig
feature.origin: Igorot (Luzon Island, Philippines) Great Spirit, created humans from cut reeds.

feature.name: Madumda
feature.origin: Pomo (N. California, USA) creator of the universe, brother of Kuksu.

feature.name: Maheo
feature.origin: Cheyenne (Great Plains, USA) Great Spirit, creator of the world.

feature.name: Malunga
feature.origin: Yao (Bantu); creator god; left Earth to live in sky when man was cruel to animals.

feature.name: Mamaldi
feature.origin: Nanai (Amur River area, E. Siberia, Russia) goddess who created the Asian continent and Sakhalin Island. For this action, she was killed by her husband and world creator, Khado.

feature.name: Manoid
feature.origin: Negrito (Malay Peninsula) female progenitor goddess; wife of Pedn.

feature.name: Mbir
feature.origin: Guarani (Paraguay, Argentina, Brazil) creator worm who appeared in pre-existing water, then became a human and made the world.

feature.name: Melo
feature.origin: Minyong (India); original male.

feature.name: Mouru Catena
feature.origin: Holy land created by Persian god Ahura Mazda (Ormazd); modern Mary/Merv Oasis, Turkmenistan.

feature.name: Mubai
feature.origin: Tibetan heavenly god.

feature.name: Mumbi
feature.origin: Mythological mother of the Kikuyu people (Kenya), wife of Gikuyu, the ancestor of the people, created by god Ngai, who took him on top of Kirinyaga (Mount Kenya) to show all the land given for him.

feature.name: Nainema
feature.origin: Uitoto (Amazon basin, SW Colombia) creator god.

feature.name: Napi
feature.origin: Blackfoot (Alberta, Canada/Montana, USA) creator of the earth, animals and mankind.

feature.name: Nareau
feature.origin: Micronesian (Gilbert Islands/Kiribati) creator of the universe; made the world from a mussel shell.

feature.name: Ndu
feature.origin: Sre and Ma (Mon-Khmer peoples, S. Vietnam) supreme god, created people and fire.

feature.name: Nishanu
feature.origin: Arikara (N. Dakota, USA) creation spirit, great sky chief.

feature.name: Nishke
feature.origin: Mordvinian (Volga River Finns, Russia) supreme god, creator of the sky and the Earth.

feature.name: Num
feature.origin: Nenets and Selkup (Samoyed) god of heaven.

feature.name: Nzame
feature.origin: Fang (Gabon) sky god and creator of all things.

feature.name: Obatala
feature.origin: Yoruba (Nigeria) sky god involved in the work of creation.

feature.name: Olorun
feature.origin: Yoruba (Nigeria) creator god, gave life to man.

feature.name: Onokoro Catenae
feature.origin: Island in Japanese mythology formed by a drop of water that fell from a sword held by the primeval deities Izanagi and Izanami.

feature.name: Ormazd
feature.origin: Persian progenitor god of light.

feature.name: Pachacamac
feature.origin: Inca supreme god, "Earth maker."

feature.name: Pan Ku
feature.origin: Miao; creator of all things.

feature.name: Parun Fossa
feature.origin: Nuristan (NE Afghanistan) river in which Bagisht, the creator of people, was born by the mother goddess Disani.

feature.name: Pedn
feature.origin: Negrito (Malay Peninsula) god who created first men.

feature.name: Pokoh
feature.origin: Pallawonaps (S. California, USA) deity who made all things.

feature.name: Pouliuli
feature.origin: The first male being in Hawaiian myth, parent (with Powehiwehi) of all the creatures in the ocean.

feature.name: Powehiwehi
feature.origin: The first female being in Hawaiian myth, parent (with Pouliuli) of all the creatures in the ocean.

feature.name: Puchou Catenae
feature.origin: Mountain in Chinese mythology attacked by horned monster Kung Chung, resulting in the Earth’s axis becoming tilted.

feature.name: [Pu Chou Chasma]
feature.origin: Mountain attacked by Kung Chung.

feature.name: Pulag Chasma
feature.origin: Mount in Igorot (Luzon Island, Philippines) mythology, on the peak of which the palace of creator god Lumawig is located.

feature.name: Puntan
feature.origin: Chamorro (Guam Island, Micronesia) pre-existent being from whose body the world was formed.

feature.name: Purusa
feature.origin: Ancient Hindu primordial being from whom the cosmos was formed.

feature.name: Qat
feature.origin: New Hebrides (Melanesia); born from a stone; formed men out of trees.

feature.name: Quwai
feature.origin: Cuebo (Columbia) god who created creeks and rocks, and stocked streams with fish.

feature.name: Samni
feature.origin: Kachins (Burma) primeval god, the male element and father of the gods.

feature.name: Seveki
feature.origin: Evenki (Siberia, Russia) creator of the earth and man.

feature.name: Shedi
feature.origin: The first woman, ancestor of human race, co-creator (with her brother and husband Melo) of the earth and sky in the myths of the Minyong (Assam, India).

feature.name: Sholmo
feature.origin: Buriat (Siberia) devil who creates.

feature.name: Shuzanghu
feature.origin: Dhammai (NE India) pre-existent male. He and his wife Zumiang-Nui were the parents of the Earth and the sky.

feature.name: Singbonga
feature.origin: Birhor (Jharkhand, E. India) creator god, who arises out of the primordial waters through the stem of a lotus.

feature.name: Taaroa
feature.origin: Tahitian god imminent in all creation; existed alone in the void.

feature.name: Talapas
feature.origin: Coyote, creator of many places and things in Chinook (NW USA) mythology.

feature.name: Tane
feature.origin: Tuamotu Islands (Polynesia) creator god.

feature.name: Tasheting
feature.origin: Lapcha (Nepal) god who created the first man and woman from the ice of mountain glaciers.

feature.name: Tawa
feature.origin: Hopi (Arizona, USA) sun god who existed at the beginning of creation, father of everything.

feature.name: Thebeksan Catena
feature.origin: Holy mountain in Korean mythology, where creator god came onto the earth.

feature.name: Thunupa
feature.origin: Inca creator of all things.

feature.name: Tika
feature.origin: Abkhaz (Georgian - eastern Black Sea region) supreme being.

feature.name: Tirawa
feature.origin: Great spirit of Pawnee Tribe (USA), created first men; his messengers were the planets, stars, lightning and thunder.

feature.name: Tore
feature.origin: Pygmy lord of the world, creator of all things.

feature.name: Torom
feature.origin: Ostyak (western Siberia) sky god.

feature.name: Tsuki-Yomi
feature.origin: Japanese moon god, born from the right eye of the primeval god Izanagi.

feature.name: Tulpar
feature.origin: Kazakh (Central Asia) winged horse born in the deep primordial ocean; personification of the sun and eternal movement.

feature.name: Tuwale
feature.origin: Ceram (Molucca Islands, Indonesia) sun god and personification of the sky, took part in creation.

feature.name: Uku
feature.origin: Estonian super god.

feature.name: Utleygon
feature.origin: Itelmen (Kamchatka Peninsula, E. Russia) creator and master of the world.

feature.name: Vatea
feature.origin: Father of gods and humans in Cook Islands mythology (Polynesia).

feature.name: Vaupas Chasma
feature.origin: River in Cuebo (Columbia) myths, where the Cuebo people were born.

feature.name: Wak
feature.origin: Ethiopian creator god, “Father of the Universe.”

feature.name: Wakonda
feature.origin: Sioux (Great Plains, USA) great creator of all things.

feature.name: Wende
feature.origin: Mossi (Burkina Faso) supreme god who lives in the sun, creator of the heavens and earth.

feature.name: Whanin
feature.origin: Korean creator of all things.

feature.name: Woyengi
feature.origin: Ijaw (Nigeria) creatrix who made men out of earth.

feature.name: Wulbari
feature.origin: Krachi (Ghana) primeval sky god, mate of mother earth.

feature.name: Wungaran Catenae
feature.origin: Place where Kakadu (N. Australia) creator goddess Imberombera landed after crossing the sea (modern Malay Bay). There he met the giant Wuraka, ancestor of all peoples.

feature.name: Wuraka
feature.origin: Kakadu (Australia) ancestor of all people; a giant.

feature.name: Xamba
feature.origin: Bushman supreme being, creator of all things.

feature.name: Xowalaci
feature.origin: Joshua (Oregon, USA) creator god.

feature.name: Xu
feature.origin: Bushman creator.

feature.name: Yamsi Chasmata
feature.origin: Lodge of the North Wind in Klamath (NW USA) myth, where the creator god Kemush slept during the creation of the world.

feature.name: Yehl
feature.origin: The Great Raven, creator and cultural hero in Tlingit (SE Alaska) myths.

feature.name: Yu-Ti
feature.origin: "August Personage of Jade"; supreme primal Chinese god.

feature.name: Zicum
feature.origin: Assyro/Babylonian primeval goddess from whom came the earth and the heavens, mother of the gods.
